channel.title: Streamlit on Mohammad Faseeh Ahmed
channel.description: Recent content in Streamlit on Mohammad Faseeh Ahmed

item.title: Beverage Management System
item.description: Project overview This Web App aids in mobile inventory management. The frontend of the mobile device shows a stream of things being displayed; a deep learning model uses this data to identify the objects and automatically updates the Inventory Database frontend display with the changes. ● Using state of the art Yolov5 model with detection speed as low as 5ms per frame. ● Built the frontend using Streamlit. ● Using SQLite3 as a Database for managing inventory.
